name: Shotgun Showdown
description:
One day I decided to challenge myself, so I thought it would be fun to create a game within 10 hours. This game is the result.

It's a first-person shooter where your shotgun has limited range and everything is a one-shot. For the people who like to hit tricks, there is a grapple implemented which can be enabled within the match settings.

The game can sometimes be buggy which is expected with a game made in just 10 hours.

There is a possibility that I will update the game in the future with bug fixes, new game modes, and general improvements. But since I don't have much time and resources it won't be in the near future.
